title: Perma Ban With No Reason
body: Hello, I got perma ban. I never had any warns and this is my first ban, why did i got perma ban straight off ?

replies.body:
If you used extreme toxicity and had previous punishments, it's possible to skip punishment tiers straight into permaban.

It is also possible that you forgot that you had a previous ban.
I'm pretty sure I wasnt that toxic :D

henkunix: oh, hi :D

Unless there's something in the foreign language part there's nothing that would warrant an escalation.

I do find this odd though:

> henkunix: thats how u play lol of legends
> hnkunix: stop
> henkunix: oh yeah

Like, why does your name lose an 'e' in the middle of your logs?
Hmm, for me everything is fine, probably a bug.

From this alone, there are 3 possibilities:

1. The system bugged (known bug) and gave you the wrong logs.  The right ones contains stuff from the zero tolerance system.
2. You forgot when you had a 14-day punishment
3. You edited something out, if that's the case, shame on you

You can submit a ticket to player support and ask them to review your punishment.

https://support.riotgames.com
I would never do that just coppied, thats it.

Have player support review it. 

The link is already posted I  my other reply.

1. Logout and back in to get the popup about your ban
2. Check the email associated with the account

One or both of those should tell you why you were banned.

If Riot suspects your account has been compromised, they'll lock it until you prove to the it's yours. If there was a chargeback or other discrepency with an RP purchase, they'll lock the account until the discrepency is resolved.

If it was for behavioral issues, it's highly unlikely this has been your only punishment and posting your chat logs will help.
So is it there any chance that I'll get 14 days suspension?
Yeah, this is my first ban, never had any other suspensions and I understand that i was a bit toxic, just wanna get like 14 day suspension like I deserve to. :)

There is a tiered punishment system in place that gies:

10 game chat restriction
25 game chat restriction
14 day suspension
Permanent suspension

You can skip tiers in cases of zero tolerance behaviors, however. Examples would be hate speech, racism, and encouragement of self harm. 

Typically cases involving those things skip to the 14 day suspension though, so if this is truly your first punishment then I would submit a support ticket about it.
I have a hunch that you might have been a little toxic.
